thread.title: Cr8tiveJ

author: Cr8tiveJ
title: Cr8tiveJ
text: I'm always sketchy of trying new websites to order things from, especially if I'll be putting in my private information. But since this site had the best price even with shipping and a bigger selection on the hair I wanted, I figured why not and gave it a try. The hair came quicker than the estimated delivery date, all in the correct packaging, clearly untouched and the hair is beautiful. I am using the Afri Naptural synthetic definition braid 100% Kanekalon for crochet braids. The hair is hard to find and I see why it's gorgeous soft to the touch and looks similar to my own relaxed hair. Will be using this website again. Thank you ElevateStyles!!
